Bash(git commit -m "feat: add 5 new dashboards with Tableau/Sigma best practices

Major enhancements to ACME Pharmacy Analytics:

NEW DASHBOARDS (5 total):
- Executive Overview: High-level KPIs with trend charts and impact messaging
- Adherence Deep Dive: Cohort analysis and distribution visualization
- Member-Level Analytics: Searchable member directory with adherence tracking
- Insights & Alerts: Real-time notifications from rules engine with playbooks
- Embedded Analytics: Hex/Tableau/Sigma/Power BI embedding guide with React component

REUSABLE COMPONENTS:
- Chart library (LineChart, BarChart, AreaChart) using Recharts
- Dashboard components (KPICard, MetricCard, DashboardCard, FilterBar)
- Navigation sidebar with dashboard links
- DashboardLayout wrapper component
- HexEmbed component for third-party dashboard integration

DESIGN IMPROVEMENTS:
- Implemented Tableau Z-layout: important content at top-left
- Applied Sigma best practices: clear hierarchy, color with intention
- Impact-first messaging throughout all dashboards
- Conditional color coding (green â‰¥80%, yellow 75-80%, red <75%)
- Responsive grid layouts with Tailwind CSS

SCHEMA UPDATES:
- Added member fields: name, age, zipCode for realistic profiles
- Added notification fields: message, recommendedAction for playbooks
- Updated seed script with 100 named members and detailed notifications

TECHNICAL STACK:
- Recharts for data visualization
- date-fns for date formatting
- lucide-react for consistent icons
- Server-side rendering with Next.js 15

DASHBOARD NAVIGATION:
- Unified sidebar navigation across all pages
- Breadcrumb navigation and page headers
- Quick links between related dashboards

All dashboards follow best practices from:
- Tableau: Z-layout, KPI emphasis, visual hierarchy
- Sigma: Grid system, interactivity, drill-down patterns
- Impact-first design: Every metric answers ''So what? Now what?''

Builds successfully. Ready for deployment.
